text: nikki digital is an organization that
was formed as a joint venture between
a2d 24 and netke hospital group the
primary reason for the the formation of
this organization was that we believe
that we have the ability to provide
really innovative fast to market
technology specifically in the
healthcare domain the technologies and
the platforms that we're building are
platforms which have a use case across
many different healthcare environments
across the world
our goal at htd 24 has always been to
use the world's best technology and when
we started probably five or six years
back hearing about aws about what tools
were available there was really nothing
in the market that could touch it and so
we made an active decision to say we're
going to be the best company in the
world at healthcare technology we need
to be working with the best cloud
infrastructure and that's when we made
that decision that we're going to start
learning aws using aws and really making
it part of our core business our most
exciting product that we are working on
today is of course the holy grail of
healthcare electronic medical records
it's something that as an organization
we are incredibly excited about because
i think what aws allows healthcare in
particular but all industries and all
segments
to do is basically develop platforms and
technologies at speed and also be in a
position to put those technologies out
to the most remote areas and allow
people from all over to be able to
access and develop on those technologies
our core aws infrastructure is based on
a serverless stack using the dynamodb
nosql database that's kind of forms the
core of everything that we use
particularly in healthcare we are very
excited on in the emr area to be using
the fhir data structure and that allows
us to take advantage of services like
aws health lake also we are using now
managed services for our security things
like aws guard to help us identify and
proactively identify threats in our
healthcare environment which as you can
imagine there's a lot of sensitivity and
a lot of importance around it security
i think there's three main reasons that
uh you know cloud is very important to
us and empowers our business the first
is allowing our team to focus on
software and end users number two
allowing us to scale very rapidly from
one user to millions of users and the
third is the cost benefit that we get
from not having to have a dedicated
infrastructure or hardware team i
believe that having the aws cape town
region helps us as south african
business to be globally relevant we can
now take products and services
conceptualized and built in south africa
but make them available to organizations
throughout the globe knowing that we can
instantly replicate our applications to
a region that's more suitable and
knowing that the standards and the
technologies that we have conformed to
are globally recognized and will hold us
in good stead from a globalization
perspective we really do believe that
there is an opportunity to take some of
the innovation and the technologies that
have been built by nikki digital we have
big ambitions as many organizations do
to be able to do this but from what
we've seen to date our technologies
stand up there with the best in the
world
